title: Designing Effective Persuasion Strategies in Online Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Persuasion-based online learning environment design for improving language proficiency among office/administrative workers.

learning_goals: Learners can design online language learning materials using persuasion strategy models (e.g., social proof, authority, consistency).
Learners can complete a case study analyzing the effectiveness of persuasion strategies using mixed research methods.
Learners can apply at least three persuasion techniques to maintain learner motivation in digital environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
